title: Honda Motorcycles and Scooter overtakes Hero Motorcorp in retail sales
description: Last month, over 2.85 lakh two wheelers, rolled out by Honda Motorcycle and Scooter, were registered across the country as against over 2.51 lakh two wheelers of Hero Motocorp, as per the Indian government's Vahan portal. This is the first time that Honda Motorcycle and Scooter pipped Hero Motocorp in retail sales.
